page.title: 12REDMARLEY YOUTH CLUB BY CLAR
page.content: On Monday we have youth club. It starts at 7.0 clock till 9.0 clock. When we get there we have to pay 20p to get in. When we have paid we get out tabletennis, snooker, darts and swingball. Sometimes we go out side and play football and volleyball. You can buy a drink, crisps and sweets for 10p 7p 2p and 1p.Sometimes we have special events like Archery. Sometimes we finish about a quarter of an hour before nine, which is when we go, and play either races, British Bulldog, or Ship Shaw. There are about 40 chidren going and more will be starting when they reach the age of 10. The children leave at the age of 16. We usually go somewhere like the Leisure Centre once every two months. We go swimming. Hopefully we are getting a Redmarley youth club mini bus to take us to Gloucester.
